explains: n. 沙丁鱼；庸碌无能的人
wordGroup: like sardines (像沙丁鱼罐头一样)紧紧地挤在一起，拥挤的

sentences.en: Choose sardines packed in olive or sardine oil.
sentences.cn: 用橄榄油或沙丁鱼油包装的沙丁鱼。

sentences.en: It is not only tuna but sardine, mackerel and other fish that are in decline.
sentences.cn: 不仅仅是金枪鱼，沙丁鱼，鲭鱼和其他鱼类也在减少。

sentences.en: There were other catches, too, perhaps two baskets of flatfish, prawns, sea crabs, and the common sardine variety.
sentences.cn: 还有其他的收获，也许有两篮比目鱼、对虾、海蟹和常见的沙丁鱼。
